name: Home Malone
description:
This is Harold Malone. His Job was furloughed. Now he is... Home Malone.

In Home Malone you manage the necessities of Malone as he plays a platformer game called Bears on his TV. 

Keyboard Controls:

WASD or Arrows to Move

Space to Interact & Jump

You can Zoom In and Out with + and - Keys

The Game was created over a weekend for the Global Game Jam 2019 by Rafi
